entry.def: A seducer is someone, usually a man, who seduces someone else.

example.ex: He is proud of his reputation as a seducer of young women.
example.tran: 他很得意自己“芳心猎手”这一名声。

means.word_mean: 1. a bad person who entices others into error or wrong-doing
2. a man who takes advantage of women
